en-us.Title: Issue
en-us.Content: If your user folder contains spaces, the Office installer will pop-up an error "We couldn't find the specified configuration file". Please upgrade to the latest version to avoid the problem.

zh-cn.Title: 程序问题
zh-cn.Content: 如果你的用户文件夹包含空格，会导致安装 Office 的时候显示 "We couldn't find the specified configuration file."。请立即更新到最新版本以避免此问题！
